errors.route_error: An error occurred while fetching the route: {{error}}

aboutUs.heroText: Discover who we are and what drives us.
aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.paragraph1: We are committed to providing high-quality, reliable VTC services tailored to your needs.
aboutUs.paragraph2: Our experienced drivers and modern fleet ensure your comfort and safety.
aboutUs.paragraph3: We believe in excellence, transparency, and customer satisfaction.
aboutUs.missionText: To offer outstanding transport services by combining professionalism, punctuality, and care.
aboutUs.visionText: To become the leading VTC service provider recognized for quality and innovation.

testimonial1.text: The best ride experience I've ever had. Professional and smooth.
testimonial1.author: Anna K.

testimonial2.text: Always on time and friendly. Highly recommended!
testimonial2.author: Marc D.

testimonial3.text: Excellent service and clean vehicles. I use them every week.
testimonial3.author: Laura B.

home.heroText: Private VTC driver in Nice and all the French Riviera

testimonial1.text: The ride was smooth and the driver was very polite.
testimonial1.author: John D.

service1.title: Airport and Train Station Transfers
service1.description: Transfers to/from Nice airport, SNCF train station, or any other destination. Personalized welcome, luggage assistance, and guaranteed punctuality.

service2.title: Chauffeur at Your Disposal
service2.description: Book a private driver by the hour for your business meetings, excursions, or shopping days. You set the schedule, we ensure your comfort.

service3.title: Private and Business Events
service3.description: Weddings, parties, seminars, conferences... Trust our team for smooth and elegant logistics.

service4.title: Long-Distance Journeys
service4.description: Need to travel to Monaco, Cannes, Marseille, or elsewhere? Enjoy a relaxed ride with a private driver.

form.title: Private Chauffeur VTC 24/7
form.description: Book your private VTC transfer in Nice online 24/7. Our dedicated team ensures fast and careful handling of each request for a quality service that adapts to your transportation needs across the French Riviera. For immediate bookings or rides in less than one hour, please contact us directly by phone or WhatsApp at
form.description1: Please fill out the form to book your trip with our VTC service. Select the date, route, and provide your contact details.
form.name: Name *
form.consent: I agree that my submitted data will be collected and stored.
form.descriptionDisposition: Book a car with driver by the hour.
form.success: Thank you! Your booking has been submitted.

error.invalidDate: Please select a valid date and time (at least 1 hour from now).
error.submit: Submission error. Please try again later.
error.network: Network error. Please try again later.

form2.success: Thank you! Your message has been sent.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How do I book a ride?
faq.a1: You can book a ride through our website or by calling the provided number.
faq.a2: Yes, you can cancel up to 24 hours before the ride without any fees.
faq.a3: We accept credit cards, Apple Pay, and cash.
faq.a4: Yes, you can request a child seat during the booking process.
faq.a5: Yes, simply enter all required addresses when booking.
faq.q6: Are your services available at night?
faq.a6: Yes, we operate 24/7 with no days off.
faq.q7: Can I estimate the price in advance?
faq.a7: Of course! Enter your pickup and drop-off locations to calculate the fare.
faq.q8: What kind of vehicles do you offer?
faq.a8: We offer a wide range of vehicles â€” from sedans to premium cars.
faq.q9: Can I book a car for a specific time?
faq.a9: Yes, you can choose the exact date and time during booking.
faq.a10: All of our drivers are VTC-licensed and undergo regular checks.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.desc: We are here to answer all your questions. Contact us by phone, email or via the form below.
contact.name: Name
contact.thanks: Thank you for your message! We will respond as soon as possible.

support.title: Support
support.desc: We are here to assist you at every step of your booking and journey.
support.issue1: How to modify my booking? - Contact us at least 24 hours before departure.
support.issue2: What if the driver is late? - Call our support immediately.
support.issue3: Payment issues? - Check your bank details or contact your bank.
support.responseTime: We usually respond within an hour during business hours.
